text: The Kearny School, at 800 S. 3rd St. in Raton, New Mexico, was built in 1936. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1996. It was a Public Works Administration project. Architecture: Art Deco Historic function: Education Historic subfunction: Library With ==References== Category:Schools in New Mexico Category:National Register of Historic Places in Colfax County, New Mexico Category:Art Deco architecture in New Mexico Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1936
title: Kearny School
